To operate our application, one you login, you have a slider view to select the menu and account setting, You can press the logout button to exit the application, you are already aware about the help function, to know more about the functionality of the application. You have a add task button at the bottom right corner of the mainscreen, as a client you are eligile to add task, about adding job to help someone to solve your technical job you are facing.
